ComicInfo.Summary:
But for a trail of black blood, the streets of Brimstone are empty. Viper and his posse discover a vault piled high with gold but guarded by a dying man armed for Armageddon. He draws his last breath with only a single word of warning: 'Run!' All hope of unraveling the mystery of Brimstone lies with Annabelle, the camp whore, captured fleeing town. She's an exotic beauty with a razor-wire tongue and a steely resolve; Viper's match in nearly every respect. But Annabelle ain't volunteering any information to her new captors. The men argue over what to do with her, even as a hidden foe stalks them in the advancing darkness. Night begins with a shriek and the most vicious attack ever witnessed in the Old West. Tonight, the battle for Brimstone boils with blood.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-12 23:08:52. [CVDB277920]

ComicInfo.Title: Trail Of Blood
